rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever Bloodlash attacks, you may put a creature card with mana value less than or equal to Bloodlash’s power from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
Changed name, added art, added flavor text
4MV —> 5MV
Boar —> Beast Horror
any number of creatures —> a creature card
2/2 —> 3/3
